abstrac: Digital and traditionally skilled illustrator, designer, artist.
bio:
Ron Weed is a General Practitioner of commercial and fine art. He has done technical illustration in the 
automotive, medical and technical industries. Related work include visual mock up illustration work in 2D and 3D product design as well as some patent illustration work. Other illustration work includes for various genres from science fiction to greeting cards. For a brief time was involved in web design (front end work and some 
animation). Other animation work has been done for smart phone games as well as supportive content creation.
Mr. Weed taught basic illustration and perspective techniques at a local community college (Macomb Community College) for two years. 
Since then he has been working as the proverbial starving artist in the freelance market.
Working terms are negotiable.

bio:
WELCOME
As your editor, I will listen to you, collaborate with you, and apply my editorial and writing talents to support your vision and complete your project to your satisfaction within the agreed-upon time frame.

I OFFER 
 ~ Superior editorial skills to showcase your writing and bring it to its highest level. 
 ~ Excellent organizational skills for smooth project management.
 ~ Professional customer service skills to assure you a satisfying experience. 

I BRING 
 ~ Twelve years editing and writing experience.
 ~ Higher education in copy editing, developmental editing, and substantive editing.
 ~ Higher education and college teaching experience in writing and literary criticism. All course work for PhD in Romance Languages and Literature. 

MY FOCUS FIELDS 
 ~ Literary fiction, mysteries, science fiction, fantasy, and short stories
 ~ Recovery, self-help, spirituality
 ~ Memoirs
 ~ Children’s literature 
 ~ Business and motivational
 ~ Liberal arts, social sciences, psychology, education
 
EXCLUSIONS
I don't write or edit poetry, technology, mathematics, or hard sciences.

PROFESSIONAL MEMBERSHIPS
National Association of Independent Writers and Editors (NAIWE)

COMMUNICATION PREFERENCE
Guru private message and email with video conferencing and/or telephone as needed.

OFFICE HOURS
9:00–4:00 U.S. Pacific Time, except Wednesdays and Sundays. 
Other telephone hours can be arranged on a project-by-project basis to meet my clients' needs. 

ONSITE WORK
I am available for on-site meetings in my geographic area. For large projects, I may be available to travel. 

METHOD OF PAYMENT AND TERMS
Payment via Guru.com. 

For fixed-fee quotes, I typically require deposit of the full fee to Guru's SafePay escrow account prior to commencement of the project and an advance on projects $500.00 or more. For hourly quotes, I typically require a retainer advance followed by the remainder deposited to Guru's SafePay escrow prior to delivery. 

I offer a 15%  same-manuscript discount for copy editing after developmental editing or proofreading after copy editing.

bio:
I am a creative writer driven with the passion to provide exceptional content for my clients. I understand how important it is to have unique content which is free of plagiarism, easy to read, with the ultimate goal of generating more traffic to your site. No one does it better. With my vast intellectual standing and experience, I deliver only the best and I have been able to create an unparalleled niche for myself in the world of creative and copywriting.


When it comes to providing quality content to my clients, I believe in being with them every step of the way. As a writer, I'm able to work with a variety of clients because of the type of content I'm able to deliver. I have done numerous projects including product descriptions, copywriting, product reviews, entertainment pieces, sports articles, articles about health, science, and more. And I'm happy to share that I have completed the assignments I'm hired for to the total satisfaction of my clients.

Now, I have 3 published novels, a B. A in Creative Writing, an A.A in Journalism and continue to learn more to further perfect my craft. I'm known to be upbeat, self-motivated, and I love helping writers become authors, empowering others to reach their dreams.
Hit me up and I'll respond in thirty minutes. No Skype.

abstrac: Our mission is to deliver high quality content within deadline
bio:
We are a UK based article writing firm. For over 8 years now, we have been producing high-quality web content in different niches. Our clients like my writing services because I deliver top quality but affordable content and within the deadline. It is for this reason that you should rest assured that your writing project is being handled by a qualified professional. 

We am a fast and accurate writer, with a keen eye for detail. I'm flexible, quick to pick up new skills and eager to learn from others. In addition, we am always keen to craft articles that meet all your requirements - that is why we get it right the first time.

We believe in employing the latest practices in the industry to produce valuable and informative content. IWe confident that my seasoned wordsmith skills can provide much value to your website. In addition, we appreciable experience in writing general articles, sales copy, SEO articles, landing pages, press releases, and copy-writing makes me a cut above the rest - we can be a greater asset to you because of it.

We know that we would be an asset to your team and would very much appreciate the opportunity to discuss how our education, experience, and creativity could contribute to your project.

Regards,
George Clark.

I deliver quality articles that adhere to client's instructions and timeline. I can handle big and small writing projects on all topics. After ordering, you can rest assured that your writing project is being handled by a professional. And if you ever need a revision, I would gladly re-script the content to your satisfaction.

5 Reasons to outsource my writing services:
1. You can publish more content consistently boosting brand awareness and engagement. This will help you launch, expand and create a loyal following. I can help you to publish across all your social media channels plus via PR.
2. Outsourcing your content creation is cheaper than hiring a full-time writer. Plus, you can access a range of writing and social media skills from our agency that you couldn't hire in-house. Hiring a the services of a freelancer like me help you to produce higher quality content, save you time and budget, and put you in a better position to achieve your KPIs.
3. Get fresh ideas and expert strategy. Hiring my writing services means that you never lose your spark and constantly see new ideas and inspiration. I have guided leading banks, fintechs, technology companies and lifestyle brands and every strategy is different.
4. You can experiment with different types of content. Technical analysis, thought leadership, PRs, Blogging, video marketing, podcasts, SEO long form content or education centers. I can create a tone of voice or work with your existing one to maximize your brand through content.
5. I love what I do and it shows. Choose a content agency that's not only great at what they do but loves doing it too! I maintain a 100% client feedback average as seen on my profile, and retain many happy clients from a variety of sectors.

Creative writing
Content Writing
Blog writing

I work 10 hours per day including weekends. While I will break my back to ensure my clients get their jobs before the stipulated deadline, it will be nice too for my employer to pay promptly.

abstrac: Need a ghostwriter who can write great fictions for you? I can write them for you.
bio:
I am Sophia and I have a passion in writing fiction especially romances.

I have ghostwritten dozens of short stories since I became a ghostwriter seven years ago. My niche is romantic stories. I have ghostwritten clean romances to even the darkest taboo erotica. 

So, if you ever need a short story that could make your heart flutter and your lips smile, I'm your girl. 

If you need a short story that could awaken the lust of your readers, I'm your girl. 

Lastly, if you need a short story that would make your reader go crazy over the heat of your erotica, I'm your woman.

I am an individual writer. I don't assign my projects to subordinates or another writer. What you would receive when you hire me is my own story with the quality I guaranteed.
For 25p to 30p books (8000 to 12000 words and with 3/4" to 1-inch margin), I charge $110 to $130. Delivery time would not be more than 12 days upon agreement of the story or outline.
